features.title: Powerful Financial Insights

tax.description: Visualize and understand your tax deductions with clear breakdowns and insights.

pension.description: Track your pension contributions and project future retirement savings.

vacation.title: Vacation Pay
vacation.description: Monitor your vacation pay accrual and usage throughout the year.

timeOff.description: Keep track of sick days, overtime, and time-off balances in one place.

hours.title: Working Hours
hours.description: Analyze working hours patterns and productivity across pay periods.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes with our simple three-step process.

upload.title: Upload Your Payslip
upload.description: Simply upload your payslip in PDF or image format and our system will do the rest.

analysis.title: Smart Analysis
analysis.description: Our AI-powered system extracts and analyzes key financial information from your document.

insights.title: Get Visual Insights
insights.description: Access beautiful charts and breakdowns of your financial data in a user-friendly dashboard.
